data.title: NOVAR 2100
data.meta_description: power factor correction, power quality and energy eficiency applications in industry, smart grids and generation.
data.text:
The NOVAR 2100 is a basic model of the innovated NOVAR 2xxx PFC line. It builds on powerful modern platform shared among other PFC and PQ instruments and offers fast and precise single-phase measurement and advanced control.

Fast Ethernet supports embedded web server, Modbus RTU or TCP, SNTP, SNMP and other protocols. Optionally the local serial line (RS-485) can be used to remotely control and supervise the compensation cabinet. Manipulation with instrument data and configurations can be restricted only to authorized users and all Ethernet communication can be optionally secured by encryption.

NOVAR 2100 instrument shares its key features and parameters with NOVAR 2200, NOVAR 2400 and NOVAR 2600 controllers.

Key features
